creator: john_sisson@insession.com
text:
The doco reads when viewed in browser "If there is an error, and the caller 
wishes to invoke an defined in the web applicaion".  Note the word missing 
between "an" and "defined".

This is probably due to the browser interpreting <error-page> in the source 
JavaDoc as markup.

I am afraid that this is not under the control of the tomcat team. This needs 
to be reported to:
servletapi-feedback@eng.sun.com

I will forward a message to the servlet spec team.
creator: markt@apache.org
